programme.title: Tutorial Cinta Mantul Neng Citul
programme.desc: Intan, a beautiful and kind cilung seller. However, one time Intan got into a conflict with her boyfriend, but she was defended by her boyfriend's younger brother. In the end, the handsome older and younger brothers ended up competing for Intan.

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 51
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Dunia Berhenti Mengejar Cintamu

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien - EP 5
programme.desc: Investigating the death of a young girl found in a refrigerated lorry, Gaby is suspended for participating in a protest by small farmers. Making the most of this enforced time off work, she takes a job at a supermarket, convinced that this is where the truth behind the case lies.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 7
programme.desc: The Musee des Beaux-Arts du Perigord offers a rich and varied selection of works. In his studio, Tuan Tran combines the finesse of glass with the brutality of concrete. programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 22
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 50
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 23
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 54
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 7
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 10
programme.desc: Fatou and Laeti argue. When she meets Api, Fatou confides that she too is starting to suspect Laeti. Api then decides to inform eric and Mouss.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey - EP 2
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 40
programme.desc: It's the last day of school. Vic, Felix and Flavie are busy preparing for the school prom. But everything seems less rosy when they discover that they're going to move home.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 11
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Secrets D'histoire - EP 3
programme.desc: In the 18th century, destinies were forged by the complex interplay of diplomacy. Pauline Bonaparte remained committed and untameable. Her marriage to Prince Borghese, heir to an influential family, made her life exciting with her own role to play and authority to exercise.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 4
programme.desc: From Cotonou to Parakou, we deep dive into Benin, the ''Latin Quarter of Africa'', which is aiming to become one of the continent's most attractive tourist destinations. On the programme: lakeside town of Ganvie, Slave Route and Gate of No Return in Ouidah, Fondation Zinsou...

programme.title: Wildlive Expeditions Sauvages
programme.desc: The naturalist Remi Dupouy's team are in Cote d'Ivoire. We explore the coastline in search of the sacred mangrove species and observe, along the Bandama River, the tense situation between hippos and humans. To the south-west, the expedition heads into the tropical rain forest, in search of the last-remaining elephants.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs ! - EP 9
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the candidates will be going head-to-head to see who produces the best three course meal using ingredients from the different regions of Quebec: a lobster starter, a lamb main dish and a blueberry gratin.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites - EP 9
programme.desc: Reves is an association that makes dreams come true for seriously ill children. With Norbert Tarayre, Nathalie Simon, Jean-Pierre Castaldi, Isabelle Morini-Bosc, Alexia Laroche-Joubert, Frederick Bousquet.

programme.title: L'amour D'une Femme
programme.desc: Marie Prieur, a young doctor, takes up a post on Ouessant Island. Quickly adopted by the inhabitants, she becomes friends with the school teacher. When she falls in love with a young engineer, Andre Lorenzi, he quickly makes it clear that she must choose between marriage and her profession.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Planete Rap - EP 9
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.title: Fort Boyard 2024, Toujours Plus Fort ! - EP 9
programme.desc: With Norbert Tarayre, Nathalie Simon, Jean-Pierre Castaldi, Isabelle Morini-Bosc, Alexia Laroche-Joubert, Frederick Bousquet, for the Reves association.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C'est Moi... Marlene Jobert
programme.desc: Veritable icon for a generation, Marlene Jobert played in innumerable films during her long and prestigious career, alternating popular comedies and social dramas. In the 1960s she launched her career in theatre and television, before becoming one of the most popular actresses in French cinema.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Ordalies, Le Tribunal De L'invisible
programme.desc: In a tribal court in Brazzaville, the judges go to great lengths to reconcile families torn apart by accusations of black magic. At the heart of this unique form of justice: a world governed by spirits, where witch doctors take revenge, sirens disappear and the unseen are always at work...

programme.title: Martinique, Sainte-Lucie, Dominique
programme.desc: Three different faces of the Lesser Antilles: Martinique and its many attractions; Saint Lucia, its little English-speaking sister to the south; Dominica, celebrated by the Kalinagos... Beyond the picture postcard scenery and legendary good life, these Caribbean islands are home to a natural world that is both generous and unspoilt.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur ! - EP 44
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie

programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Edwin Fardini, Poetique De La Terre
programme.desc: The French lyrical singer, Edwin Fardini has sung a thousand and one stories yet never recounted his own. Through the creative process for this experimental work, he questions his dual identity from metropolitan and overseas France. How to be both? How to allow our different fundamental influences to coexist?

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade - EP 9
programme.desc: Clemence Castel and Christopher discover Seine-Maritime together. A family assistant, Christopher has always been immersed in the social field and loves creating moments of sharing for the children he welcomes.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean - EP 3
programme.desc: Educational marine areas allow students to ''manage'' a coastal zone. In Polynesia, this educational program raises youth awareness of marine protection by actively involving them in preserving their natural environment.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 13
programme.desc: Emmanuel lives in a chalet in the heart of the Munster Valley, set in the midst of nature.

programme.title: African Empires - EP 1
programme.desc: He reigned at the beginning of the 1800s, the emperor who became known as the ''African Napoleon''. A reign as short as it was intense, after taking barely ten years to conquer a large part of southern Africa, Shaka gave birth to a glorious and proud people: the Zulus.

programme.title: Tour De Cote D'ivoire 2025
programme.desc: Summary of the day's Tour de la Cote d'Ivoire with highlights, classifications and the chance to find out more about a location from the day's stage.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 30
programme.desc: Chef Ayaba Galbas prepares a coconut milk and baobab panna cotta, with a red dragon fruit compote and ylang-ylang essence.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 13

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 2
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 50
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 35
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs ! - EP 36
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 15
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 16
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. programme.title: Pompon Ours, Les Speciaux - EP 1

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Marathon Des Sables Cappadoce 2025 - Comme Tout Le Monde
programme.desc: The best images from the 2025 edition of the Cappadocia Marathon des Sables. During this competition, we followed in particular Pierre Borgella, an athlete with a leg amputation, and his cousin Leo. Pierre set himself a colossal challenge: to complete his first MDS on crutches.

programme.title: Tempete
programme.desc: Zoe grows up on a stud farm and her only dream is to become a jockey. Her mare Tempete is her best friend. But they have an accident one stormy evening. Zoe is left paraplegic. She clings on for years and tries to achieve the impossible of fulfilling her destiny.

programme.title: Movie - Namma Veettu Pillai
programme.desc: Arumpon is a village youth who adores his adopted sister and constantly dotes on her. However, he is soon forced to arrange her marriage to a ruffian he despises.

programme.title: Movie - Ameerin Aadhi Baghavan
programme.desc: Aadhi, a smart and suave smuggler in Bangkok, falls in love with a waitress. However he finds himself in trouble when she frames him for all the crimes committed by his look-alike, Bhagavan.

programme.title: Movie - Odipolama
programme.desc: Visu, a computer science student, falls in love with Anjali and comes to live in her locality. But problems force Anjali to make a tough decision, and she runs away from her home.

programme.title: Movie - Oli Pirandhadhu
programme.desc: Singaram, a car driver, falls in love with Kalyani, who comes to stay in his neighbourhood. But his dream shatters when he realises that she is already married to an old man.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Ragalapuram
programme.desc: A cowardly police officer is told by his family that he has blood cancer. In order to claim insurance money for his family, he goes on a suicidal mission and takes on criminals single-handedly.

programme.title: Movie - Pollaathavan (New)
programme.desc: Prabhu is dejected when he learns that his bike has been stolen. He decides to find the people who stole the bike, but lands in trouble when he realises that his bike has been used to transport drugs.

programme.title: Movie - Sketch
programme.desc: Sketch works under a loan shark who takes the vehicles of those who are unable to pay him back. However, one such defaulter is a deadly gangster who turns livid when he finds that his car is taken.

programme.title: Movie - Badhri
programme.desc: When a kickboxer gets attacked by his enemies and ends up bedridden, his brother sets out to fulfil his dream of winning the kickboxing championship.

programme.title: Movie - Ponniyin Selvan 1
programme.desc: Sensing an uprising in the capital, Crown Prince Aditha Karikalan sends his friend Vallavaraiyan Vandiyadevan on a mission that sets off a series of conspiracies against the reigning king.

programme.title: Movie - Sri
programme.desc: Srikantu and his uncle travel to India from Bangkok to seek Srikantu's ancestral property. However, when he meets Jennifer in a bank, a group of robbers are planning to kidnap the trio.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Mutham Oru Yudham
programme.desc: Oru Mutham Oru Yutham is a Tamil romantic movie directed by Suba Selvam. The film stars Uday Kiran and Swetha Basu Prasad.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Nadigayin Vaakkumoolam
programme.desc: A reporter sets off to find an actress who disappeared into obscurity at the peak of her career. She finally finds the actress at a brothel and learns some shocking truths.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sollamale
programme.desc: Shwetha, a rich and kind woman, assumes that Nadaraj cannot speak and shows empathy towards him. When their friendship blossoms into love, Nadaraj faces an arduous task of proving his love.

programme.title: Movie - Dhinandhorum
programme.desc: Dhinamdhorum is a 1998 Tamil-language film directed by Nagaraj. The film features Murali and Suvalakshmi in the lead roles, while Manivannan and Renuka play supporting roles, with music by Oviyan.

programme.title: Movie - Vazhve Mayam
programme.desc: Raja and Devi fall in love with each other and get engaged. However, when Raja learns that he is suffering from cancer, he hides it from Devi and calls off the engagement.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Oorille Oru Rajakumari
programme.desc: After being mistreated by his family for being unemployed, a youth decides to get married only to a princess but eventually falls for a poor girl. The girl is actually a princess and is in search of a man who will love her for her and not her riches.

programme.title: Movie - Villan
programme.desc: Shiva, a bus conductor, robs from the corrupt in order to fund an organisation that aids the disabled. He also pretends to be his own disabled twin in order to avoid detection and trial.

programme.title: TotalEnergies BWF World C'ships 2025 (Live)
programme.desc: The BWF World Championships is the most prestigious badminton competition, offering the most ranking points. The winners of the tournament are World Champions of the sport and are awarded a gold medal. The tournament started in 1977. Starting 2006, the tournament was changed to an annual event on the BWF calendar. The tournament is not held during the Summer Olympics years to avoid schedule conflicts.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: (Zhao Xintong vs Mark Williams)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Nottingham Forest (MW02) - EP 17
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have never won in 10 previous Premier League meetings with Nottingham Forest (D6 L4). It’s both the most they’ve ever faced a side without winning and the most Forest have faced a side without losing in the competition.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke’s journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26 - EP 2
programme.desc: Tim Howard spent a decade as Everton’s first choice goalkeeper, the club that defined his Premier League career. The American recalls his journey from New Jersey, via Old Trafford, to Goodison Park, and his most memorable moments between the posts.

programme.title: PL Moments 2025/26 - EP 1
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar reflects on his remarkable career in English football, selecting his ten greatest Premier League moments from his time with Fulham and Manchester United, sharing the stories behind iconic saves, record breaking runs, and title winning triumphs that cemented his status as one of the league’s all-time great goalkeepers.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Brentford (MW03) - EP 24
programme.desc: Sunderland vs Brentford will be the 940th different fixture to have been played in the Premier League. They last faced in the top-flight in the 1946-47 campaign, with the Black Cats winning 3-0 away and 2-1 at home.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Everton (MW03) - EP 26
programme.desc: Wolves have lost just two of their 11 Premier League home games against Everton (W4 D5), going down 3-0 in April 2011 and 2-1 in January 2021.

programme.title: The Saturday Wrap 2025/26 - EP 3
programme.desc: A complete review of all the day’s Premier League football, with highlights and studio discussion. The Saturday Wrap broadcasts immediately after Premier League Live on Saturday.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Fulham (MW03) - EP 22
programme.desc: Fulham won this exact fixture 2-1 last season, ending a 21-game winless streak away to Chelsea in all competitions. They’ve never won consecutive visits to Stamford Bridge in their history.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Burnley (MW03) - EP 23
programme.desc: Manchester United have lost just one of their last 25 home games against Burnley in all competitions (W15 D9), going down 2-0 in January 2020.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Bournemouth (MW03) - EP 25
programme.desc: Tottenham manager Thomas Frank has managed more Premier League games against Bournemouth without losing than against any other side (P6 W4 D2), while the only manager he’s beaten more often than Andoni Iraola (3) is David Moyes (5).

programme.title: Leeds United vs Newcastle United (MW03) - EP 27
programme.desc: Leeds have lost just one of their last six Premier League games against Newcastle (W2 D3), going down 1-0 at home in January 2022.

programme.title: FS MMA Dan Evensen vs. Jeremiah Constant
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Dan Evensen fights Jeremiah 'Hacksaw' Constant. Constant is a game opponent and looks to make his mark against Evenson in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Return to the Ring Rocky Gannon vs. Dominick Carter
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. In this original documentary series, we sit with the participants from some of boxing's most interesting bouts, including the fighters, trainers, officials and promoters that contributed to each event.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Tokyo, Japan at the Ryogoku Kokugikan, features Kiribayama, Terunofuji, Mitakeumi and Daieisho.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Team Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: Highlights from the 26th Karate Senior World Championships as top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, all converged on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Return to the Ring Rocky Gannon vs. Dominick Carter
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. In this original documentary series, we sit with the participants from some of boxing's most interesting bouts, including the fighters, trainers, officials and promoters that contributed to each event.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Tokyo, Japan at the Ryogoku Kokugikan, features Kiribayama, Terunofuji, Mitakeumi and Daieisho.

programme.title: World Karate Federation

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Abu Dhabi Grand Slam on world Judo day, we speak to double world champion Mayra Aguiar about the unity of the Brazilian judo team, and watch as two world champions battle for gold in the -57kg division.

programme.desc: This episode features a middleweight battle between Dmitry Priog and Daniel Jacobs that ends in a crushing overhand right, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his NABF welterweight title against Jose Miguel Cotto, Alvarez's final bout before rising through the ranks and championships of the WBC. Also on the card, a heavyweight kickboxing clash between Errol Zimmerman vs. Rico Verhoeven.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Stanley cleans Cynthia's bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. It's so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Stanley, Sophie and Benjamin make up a new game, 'Dino-Pirates'. This is such a good game, they use it as inspiration for Stanley's carnival float.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Stanley must keep Myrtle's pumpkin safe from Speedy the snail. He builds a series of obstacles and defences to protect it from the tenacious Speedy who tests Stanley's ingenuity.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Morris and Pearl have lost one of their medals in the canal. Stanley fishes it out only have the complete collection dropped in. Stanley dons a diver's suit and goes after them.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Stanley must track down the missing library book, 'The Little Book of New Things to Do'. He visits various townsfolk who have leant the book to each other.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Myrtle wants everyone to see her new dance so enlists Stanley to gather some friends. However, the stereo breaks so they have to make their own music.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Cynthia asks Stanley to teach her to fly an aeroplane for Fifi's birthday. Stanley constructs a flight simulator and has the help of their friends to put her through her paces.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Stanley covers Jose at the shop and ends up making too much popcorn. So as not to waste it all, Stanley and his friends put on a film night to screen Little Woo's film.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Stanley has to fix Myrtles wobbly sofa so her and her friends can watch Fred and Fifi on the Boogie Woogie Dance Show together. He ends up creating a super-duper special sofa.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Monty thinks Gran's soup might be the tastiest ever, but he wonders how you can know if something is the best in the world.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Jared has a special plant which needs a pot, so JoJo makes him one in a pottery class. When the pot is knocked onto the floor and breaks, Gran Gran has a plan.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 31
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran, Ezra and Jaxon are all set for a day of sledging in the snow, but when the sledge breaks, Gran Gran comes up with a plan so that they all can keep having fun in the snow!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: A search for shade on a hot day leads Sarah and Duck to discover a fascinating tower.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try to recreate it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 7
programme.desc: Nia is excited about being asked to transport a new elephant to the animal park, but the animal is scared of steam trains.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 21
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 45
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 46
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 47
programme.desc: The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Sienna is cooking Nigerian Jollof Rice. Sienna's dad has prepared a colourful Nigerian salad to eat with the rice and they have treated their guests to some Nigerian 'chin chin' too.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout jet off in the Explorer and head to Thailand on a global adventure in search of long-tailed macaques. The team discover macaques have an appetite for shellfish.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 18
programme.desc: Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Krash discovers an abandoned toy train carriage in the corner of the room.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 46
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 47
programme.desc: Mum bans the girls from saying the word 'dunny' because it's not a word the Queen of England would use, but the kids try and trick her into saying it anyway.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: Evil Pea causes chaos in the veggie aisle with a trolley loaded to the brim with stinky cheese. Supertato and Broccoli must use the Tato Car to get rid of the stink.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Little Woo and Seamus call Stanley to help them build a den so they can watch the bugs in the forest without disturbing them. Stanley builds a giant, camouflaged den on legs.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Fifi asks Stanley to help her find a new place for her friend Isabelle the Sun-bell Daisy. This proves trickier than initially planned as Isabelle has some specific needs.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Myrtle, Sophie and Benjamin call Stanley to teach them how to make a sandcastle. Myrtle asks for a bigger one, so big it turns into a sandcastle resort!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Fred, Fifi and Ari call Stanley to help them with their recycling drive by coming up with a way of repurposing all the towns' old stuff. Stanley makes a crazy golf course!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 47

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield (S1) - EP 3

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. programme.title: The Agenda

programme.title: Africa Live

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Week 22 (R)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: Nomura Mansai’s Lucky Bag on Radio: TV Special Edition "Hanyu Yuzuru" (R)
programme.desc: This is the TV version of a radio talk show originally aired last April, featuring a conversation between Kyogen actor and performer Nomura Mansai and figure skater Hanyu Yuzuru. In March, during the ice show "notte stellata 2025", they collaborated on SEIMEI-the program that earned Hanyu his Olympic gold in PyeongChang.

programme.title: Neighbor's Nurturing Session (R)
programme.desc: The program is for parents raising children from elementary to junior high school ages. Parenting problems are difficult to talk to Mom/Dad friends, but they can be serious problems for those involved. Sharing sympathetic voices and ideas gathered from parenting families across the country, we work together to find solutions.

programme.title: MIX Bijutune! (R)

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: ETV Special "Letters from Hiroshima: Americans Reflecting on the Atomic Bomb" (R
programme.desc: Eighty years ago, U.S. President Harry S. Truman made the decision to drop the atomic bomb and continued to justify it. However, just before the end of the war, he wrote a letter to a congressman expressing "regret" over the countless lives lost due to the bomb. Letters written by Americans at the time, including those from presidents, scientists, and citizens, reveal their inner conflict between national duty and personal conscience in the face of nuclear weapons’ immense power.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 33 (R)
programme.desc: The story depicts the turbulent life of Tsutaya Juzaburo (Yokohama Ryusei), known as "Tsutaju", a man who laid the foundation for Japan’s media industry and pop culture. Despite the close scrutiny of the shogunate, he relentlessly pursued humor and entertainment. This thrilling drama is filled with laughter, tears, and mystery.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE (R)
programme.desc: Let’s look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.title: News: Good Morning, Japan

programme.title: News: Good Morning, Japan
programme.desc: Fresh news and information to start off the morning. Specialized reporters and anchors will wake up the viewers with this live news program.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Eps. 111
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Aerial Travelogue China: Empress Dowager Cixi's Escape (R)
programme.desc: Traveling through the vast land of China by drone. This episode traces the escape route by Empress Dowager Cixi toward Xi’an during the Qing Dynasty, China’s last imperial dynasty.

programme.desc: The 94th Drama Serial is about a girl Tsuneko who struggles to protect her mother and two sisters instead of her deceased father with following his lesson "How precious a normal life is." The lifestyle magazine published by Tsuneko becomes a must-read book for every woman living through the high economic growth period.

programme.title: Neighbor's Nurturing Session (R)
programme.desc: The program is for parents raising children from elementary to junior high school ages. Parenting problems are difficult to talk to Mom/Dad friends, but they can be serious problems for those involved. Sharing sympathetic voices and ideas gathered from parenting families across the country, we work together to find solutions.

programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a word as a theme, exploring its meaning and history while discovering the charm of Japanese language. programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: To Grow With Love - EP 18
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Airport Strikers - EP 18
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Airport Strikers - EP 19
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. programme.title: Wax and Wane - EP 13
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Road To Eternity - EP 6
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Mission - EP 15
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 16
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A - EP 1
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 15
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 16
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The "passion choir pilot program" trains students from three underperforming schools' choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the "passion choir" and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family's objection, so Hong's maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong's enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fiance so as to drive away two women whom he does not like...

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern - an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all...

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense...

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 42
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Right up Your Alley - EP 1
programme.desc: Right up Your Alley takes you on a delicious journey through bustling streets and hidden alleys. Taste authentic local delights, hear heartfelt stories, and discover the soul of the city in its most genuine form.

programme.title: Unchained Love - EP 12
programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: Unchained Love - EP 13
programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: James' Going Places - EP 51
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 242
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2025 - EP 22
programme.desc: Ride the Wind 2025 takes the stage outdoors for the first time, breaking boundaries with an open-air performance like never before. With unstoppable determination, the Sisters forge ahead, embracing the unknown and embarking on five extraordinary journeys. Get ready for an electrifying season filled with surprises and brilliance!

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 5 - EP 1
programme.desc: A brand-new, high-stakes format "Alliance Battles with Group Elimination" kicks off this season. Seven teams are divided into two alliances, sharing votes within each. The alliance with the lowest total votes will see an entire team eliminated. A gripping battle of passion, teamwork, and perseverance unfolds among the brothers. Who will rise, and who will fall?

programme.title: Right up Your Alley - EP 1
programme.desc: Right up Your Alley takes you on a delicious journey through bustling streets and hidden alleys. Taste authentic local delights, hear heartfelt stories, and discover the soul of the city in its most genuine form.

programme.title: Woori The Virgin - EP 4
programme.desc: Oh Woo-ri has vowed to remain a virgin until she marries and has avoided romantic relationships to maintain her chastity. However, during a routine medical exam, a terrible mix-up occurs, resulting in accidental artificial insemination.

programme.title: Blue Moment - EP 2
programme.desc: This gripping drama centers on the looming threats of massive meteorological disasters and their impact on human lives. It follows the unwavering dedication of a Special Disaster Management team who armed with expertise and courage, risk everything on the front lines to save lives.
